response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value for me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am eager to share it. Given its significance and quality, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to be mutually beneficial, ensuring you receive a valuable asset while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1200000}
